meanings.def: the number you get when you add two or more numbers together
examples: The sum of 7 and 12 is 19.
Calculate the sum of the following figures.

meanings.def: all of something, especially when you think that it is not very much
examples: This is the sum of my achievements so far.

meanings.def: a simple problem that involves calculating numbers
examples: to do a sum in your head

meanings.def: to be better or more effective as a group than you would think just by looking at the individual members of the group

meanings.def: used to introduce a short statement of the main points of a discussion, speech, etc.
